title: 95/374/EC: Commission Decision of 8 September 1995 on the carrying out of Community trials on propagating and planting material of certain species under Article 20 (2) of Council Directive 92/33/EEC
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 8 September 1995 on the carrying out of  Community trials on propagating and planting material of certain species under Article 20  (2) of  Council Directive 92/33/EEC (95/374/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body: Community trials on propagating and planting material of Allium spp.  and Lycopersicon lycopersicum shall be carried out during 1995 to be used for the harmonization of  technical methods of examination.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 September 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
